    nOpsDocs - the home of nOps documentation
    Edit me

    Welcome to the resource center for nOps. If there is an article you’d like to see added, please let us know. Help is only a click away in the platform with our chatbot if you still need help.

    Getting connected with the nOps platform only takes a few minutes:

    1. First, log into your AWS Payer/Management account.
    2. In a second tab, register for an nOps account
    3. Verify your account, and log back in to nOps. Don’t close your AWS tab.
    4. In the nOps tab, you will be prompted to start setting up your AWS account.
    5. Follow the steps for the nOps Setup Wizard to finish configuring your Management/Payer account.
      1. Provide an account name to display within nOps
      2. Specify an S3 bucket for the Cost and Usage Report to be written
      3. Click to launch the CloudFormation Stack
